TopicTitle: Ther is no biomes for Duna yet is there? ...

Articles.Content: After having just put an orbital laboratory in LDO I just realized.. there are no biomes on Duna is there? Because I spent the good part of the night building an SSTO lander that can dock with this station, anaylise/transmit the data, undock and do it all over again. But this is pointless isn't it? So would I benefit more by returning this data to Kerbin? Or.. will I be able to get some use out of this shuttle/lander?

There is High over, Low Over, lying at, Landed at and Poles. That's it. To answer your other question, it is far more beneficial to return Data to Kerbin because (In .23) there is a Transmission Cap of 40% or whatever the Science Module gives you, whichever is greater.
You can hit up Ike with a science lab while you're in the area.
The only places with biomes are Kerbin, Minmus, and the Mun. There will probably be more in the future.

The only places with biomes are Kerbin, Minmus, and the Mun. There will probably be more in the future.

Not True, Eve and Laythe also have Surface and Ocean biomes.
